title: Anywhere Door CMS
description: A centralized content management system connecting global teams instantly.

details.problem: Global teams were using fragmented tools (Email, Excel, Slack) to manage content, leading to version conflicts and 48hr delays.
details.solution: Built a 'Single Source of Truth' platform. Like the Anywhere Door, it allows instant access to any project's status from any location.
details.impact: Reduced content update time from 2 days to 5 minutes. Zero version conflict incidents in Q4.

title: Translation Gummy
description: Real-time AI translation API for cross-border e-commerce chat.

details.problem: Customer support agents couldn't handle inquiries from 12 different countries efficiently, causing high drop-off rates.
details.solution: Integrated an LLM-based translation layer into the chat widget. Agents type in English; users see their native language.
details.impact: International sales conversation rate increased by 22%. Support team can now scale without hiring native speakers for every region.

title: Memory Bread LMS
description: Spaced repetition learning platform that ensures 100% retention.

details.problem: Corporate training had a 15% completion rate. Employees found the material boring and hard to remember.
details.solution: Gamified the learning process using the 'Memory Bread' concept—digesting small chunks of knowledge daily via mobile notifications.
details.impact: Course completion rate soared to 85%. Employee compliance scores hit record highs.

title: Time Furoshiki
description: Automated backup and rollback system to restore any state instantly.

details.problem: Production deployments were risky. Rollbacks took 4 hours, causing massive potential revenue loss during downtime.
details.solution: Created a containerized snapshot system. Like the Time Furoshiki, it wraps the environment and can revert it to a 'fresh' state instantly.
details.impact: Deployment fear is gone. We seek to deploy on Fridays now (just kidding, but we could).

title: Take-Copter Logistics
description: Route optimization algorithm for last-mile delivery fleets.

details.problem: Delivery drivers were taking inefficient routes, wasting fuel and missing delivery windows.
details.solution: Implemented a 'Take-Copter' view algorithm that calculates the most direct path accounting for traffic and weather.
details.impact: Fleet fuel costs dropped 15% in the first month. Customer 'On-Time' satisfaction score rose to 4.9/5.

title: Copy Robot Testing
description: AI agent swarm that mimics user behavior to test UI.

details.problem: Manual QA testing was the bottleneck. We had 2 QA engineers for 15 developers.
details.solution: Deployed 'Copy Robots'—automated E2E test suites that run on every pull request, mimicking real user clicks.
details.impact: Release cycle shortened from 2 weeks to 3 days. Critical bugs caught in staging increased by 200%.

title: Mood Orchestra
description: Sentiment analysis tool to gauge team morale in real-time.

details.problem: Remote work made it hard to sense team burnout. HR only found out when resignation letters arrived.
details.solution: A Slack bot that acts like the 'Mood Orchestra', playing the right 'tune' (asking the right questions) to gauge vibe without being intrusive.
details.impact: Early detection of burnout risks allowed managers to intervene proactively. Team retention improved significantly.

title: Pass Loop Security
description: Loophole-free authentication gateway for enterprise systems.

details.problem: Legacy login systems were vulnerable and users hated remembering 10 passwords.
details.solution: A 'Pass Loop' SSO gateway. Once you pass through, you are securely authenticated everywhere within the ecosystem.
details.impact: Security audit passed with flying colors. User login complaints dropped to near zero.

title: Time-Saving Cloth ERP
description: Smart resource planning system that wraps complex data in simple views.

details.problem: Legacy ERP systems were bloated and slow, causing data entry to take hours manually.
details.solution: Developed a 'Time-Saving Cloth' interface layer that simplifies complex database interactions into drag-and-drop actions.
details.impact: Administrative overhead reduced by 30%. Data entry errors dropped to near zero.
